titleStmt.title: An exhortation to mutual charity and union among Protestants in sermon preach'd before the King and Queen at Hampton-Court, May 21. 1689 / by William Wake ... publish'd by His Majesties special command.
titleStmt.author: Wake, William, 1657-1737.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Ric. Chiswell ... and W. Rogers ...,
